pullrequest.title: Refactor some physics::SurfaceParams code (part of pull request #1386)

content.raw: After some offline discussion, it was decided that we should use if statements (not assets) to check arguments to public functions. So these changes to `SurfaceParams::Load` were not acceptable. I will resubmit another pull request similar to the original pull request #1386.
content.html: After some offline discussion, it was decided that we should use if statements (not assets) to check arguments to public functions. So these changes to SurfaceParams::Load were not acceptable. I will resubmit another pull request similar to the original pull request #1386.
